Dear Yes its very importanat.According to general rule of CBSE EXAMINATION The Examination would be conducted in theory as well as in practicals, depending upon the nature of the subject(s) and the marks/grades allotted shall be as prescribed in the curriculum.(i) Assessment of theory/practical papers in external subjects shall be in numerical scores in addition to numerical scores, the Board shall indicate grades in the marks sheets issued to the candidates in case of subjects of external examinations. In case of internal assessmentsubjects, only grades shall be shown.There are basically five subjects in Central Board of Secondary Education 10+2 board examinations. One may opt for some other optional subjects also. Mathematics or biology. Physics. Chemistry. English. Any optional subject of own choice. Theory examination is held for each subject but practical examination is held for Physics, Chemistry and Biology only. For Physics, Chemistry and Biology, out of 70 marks, a candidate needs to score 23 marks to pass in these papers and in practical exam, out of 30 marks, one needs to score 33% which means 10. A candidate needs to score overall 33% to pass the exam. Similarly in mathematics or english, you need to score 33% marks. For exact details about the academics of your respective boards you must visit the official link of your board of education. Here is my facebook official page Legal Biru and associates Thank you

Ofcourse they are. Practicals in class 12th are really important. They carry a lot of weightage in making up of your 12th marks. Unless you don't want to pull down your grades, you must learn to perform them so that you don't lose those precious marks. Also viva question are based on them and they can be deadly. I have seen my friends giving dumb answers because they did not pay any heed to practicals and this brought their total score down. So you must study them properly so that you can perform any experiment you're asked for. Therefore, they are really important in building up your total score. Hope this helps. :D

Definiately they are extremely important because of following reasons: These will be there in exams without failure.Generally it will help you to score more compare to a theory question.Practicals consumes less times to solve in exam compare to write a theory question.Doing preperation also you need to remember less to solve a practical question compare to a therot question.In future studies also practical question will be asked. So this will help you cultivate a habit towards further studies.
